Wisdom: الْعِتَابُ حَيَاةُ الْمَوَدَّةِ
enWisdom: Goodwill [and friendly admonishment] is the life of friendship [and affection]

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا سُمِّيَ الصَّدِيقُ صَدِيقاً لِأَنَّهُ يَصْدُقُكَ فِي نَفْسِكَ وَمَعَايِبِكَ فَمَنْ فَعَلَ ذَلِكَ فَاسْتَنِمْ إِلَيْهِ فَإِنَّهُ الصَّدِيقُ
enWisdom: The friend has been named ?ad?q because he is truthful to you about your nature and faults, so have confidence in one who does this for he is your [true] friend

Wisdom: صَدِيقُكَ مَنْ نَهَاكَ وَعَدُوُّكَ مَنْ أَغْرَاكَ
enWisdom: Your friend is one who forbids you [from evil] and your enemy is one who entices you [to Perform evil]

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِمُؤَاخَاةِ مَنْ حَذَّرَكَ وَنَهَاكَ فَإِنَّهُ يُنْجِدُكَ وَيُرْشِدُكَ
enWisdom: You should build a bond of brotherhood with the one who cautions and forbids you [from doing evil] for verily he is aiding and guiding you

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ آثَرُ النَّاسِ عِنْدَكَ [إِلَيْكَ‏] مَنْ أَهْدَى إِلَيْكَ عَيْبَكَ [مَرْشَدَكَ‏] وَأَعَانَكَ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ
enWisdom: Let the most preferred people in your eyes be the ones who guide you to your faults and help you to reform yourself

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ أَحَبُّ [آثَرُ] النَّاسِ إِلَيْكَ مَنْ هَدَاكَ إِلَى مَرَاشِدِكَ [أَهْدَى إِلَيْكَ مَرْشَدَكَ‏] وَكَشَفَ لَكَ عَنْ مَعَايِبِكَ
enWisdom: Let the most beloved of all people to you be one who guides you to the right and discloses your faults to you

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحَبَّكَ نَهَاكَ
enWisdom: One who loves you forbids you [from evil]

Wisdom: مَنْ بَصَّرَكَ عَيْبَكَ فَقَدْ نَصَحَكَ
enWisdom: One who shows you your fault has indeed counselled you

Wisdom: مَنْ أَبَانَ لَكَ عَيْبَكَ فَهُوَ وَدُودُكَ
enWisdom: One who informs you of your faults is indeed your friend

Wisdom: مَنْ كَاشَفَكَ فِي عَيْبِكَ حَفِظَكَ فِي غَيْبِكَ
enWisdom: One who discloses your faults to you guards you in your absence

Wisdom: مَنْ بَصَّرَكَ عَيْبَكَ وَحَفِظَكَ فِي غَيْبِكَ فَهُوَ الصَّدِيقُ فَاحْفَظْهُ
enWisdom: One who keeps good ties [and company] with his brothers makes their bond [with him] last longer

Wisdom: مَنْ أَخَافَكَ لِكَيْ يُؤْمِنَكَ خَيْرٌ لَكَ مِمَّنْ يُؤْمِنُكَ لِكَيْ يُخِيفَكَ
enWisdom: One who frightens you [from committing sins] in order to protect you [from punishment] is better than one who gives you a [false] sense of security on order that you may become frightened

Wisdom: الصَّدِيقُ مَنْ كَانَ نَاهِياً عَنِ الظُّلْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِ مُعِيناً عَلَى الْبِرِّ وَالْإِحْسَانِ
enWisdom: The [true] friend is he who forbids [one from] injustice and wrongdoing while helping [one] to perform good deeds and be righteous

Wisdom: أَحْبِبْ فِي اللَّهِ مَنْ يُجَاهِدُكَ عَلَى صَلَاحِ دِينٍ وَيُكْسِبُكَ حُسْنَ يَقِينٍ
enWisdom: Love for the sake of Allah the one who struggles against you for the betterment of [your] religion and covers you with the mantle of certitude

Wisdom: أَخُوكَ الصَّدِيقُ مَنْ وَقَاكَ بِنَفْسِهِ وَآثَرَكَ عَلَى مَالِهِ وَوَلَدِهِ وَعِرْسِهِ
enWisdom: Your brother for the sake of Allah is one who guides you towards rectitude, forbids you from corruption and assists you to improve your Hereafter

Wisdom: أَحَقُّ مَنْ أَحْبَبْتَهُ مَنْ نَفْعُهُ لَكَ وَضَرُّهُ لِغَيْرِكَ
enWisdom: The most worthy of those whom you love is he whose benefit is for you and whose harm is for other than you

Wisdom: إِذَا وَجَدْتَ مِنْ أَهْلِ الْفَاقَةِ مَنْ يَحْمِلُ لَكَ زَادَكَ إِلَى يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ فَيُوَفِّيكَ بِهِ غَداً حَيْثُ تَحْتَاجُ إِلَيْهِ فَاغْتَنِمْهُ وَحَمِّلْهُ إِيَّاهُ وَأَكْثِرْ مِنْ تَزْوِيدِهِ وَأَنْتَ قَادِرٌ عَلَيْهِ فَلَعَلَّكَ أَنْ تَطْلُبَهُ فَلَا تَجِدَهُ
enWisdom: If you find from the needy people one who will carry your provision for you up to the Day of Resurrection and return it to you tomorrow when you need it most, then take the opportunity and give it to him, and increase the provisions that you give him [to carry for you] while you are able to, for it is possible that you may [at one time] seek him but not find him

Wisdom: جَمَالُ الْأُخُوَّةِ إِحْسَانُ الْعِشْرَةِ [الْعُسْرَةِ] وَالْمُوَاسَاةُ مَعَ الْعُسْرَةِ [الْعِشْرَةِ]
enWisdom: The embellishment of brotherhood is good companionship and [giving] support despite [financial] difficulty

Wisdom: خَيْرُ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ وَاسَاكَ وَخَيْرٌ مِنْهُ مَنْ كَفَاكَ وَإِنِ احْتَاجَ إِلَيْكَ أَعْفَاكَ [خَيْرُ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ إِذَا احْتَجْتَ إِلَيْهِ كَفَاكَ وَإِذَا احْتَاجَ إِلَيْكَ أَعْفَاكَ‏]
enWisdom: The best of your brothers is the one who supports you, and better than him is the one who suffices for you, and when he needs you, he excuses you [if you are unable to assist him]

Wisdom: خَيْرُ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ وَاسَاكَ بِخَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرٌ مِنْهُ مَنْ أَغْنَاكَ عَنْ غَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: The best of your brothers is he who supports you with his benevolence, and better than him is one who makes you needless of all other than him

Wisdom: خَيْرُ إِخْوَانِكَ مَنْ دَلَّكَ عَلَى هُدًى وَأَكْسَبَكَ تُقًى وَصَدَّكَ عَنِ اتِّبَاعِ هَوًى
enWisdom: The best of your brothers is the one who shows you the path of guidance

Wisdom: صَاحِبِ الْإِخْوَانَ بِالْإِحْسَانِ وَتَغَمَّدْ ذُنُوبَهُمْ بِالْغُفْرَانِ
enWisdom: Accompany your brothers with kindness and cover their offences with forgiveness

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ أَحَبُّ النَّاسِ إِلَيْكَ وَأَحْظَاهُمْ لَدَيْكَ أَكْثَرَهُمْ سَعْياً فِي مَنَافِعِ النَّاسِ
enWisdom: Let the most beloved person to you and the one who has the greatest status in your eyes be the one who strives hardest in benefiting people

Wisdom: مَنِ اهْتَمَّ بِكَ فَهُوَ صَدِيقُكَ
enWisdom: Whoever is concerned about you, then he is your [true] friend

Wisdom: لَا يَشْبَعُ الْمُؤْمِنُ وَأَخُوهُ جَائِعٌ
enWisdom: A believer is never satiated while his brother is hungry
